thread.title: Ronna Rollins
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Ronna Rollins

author: Ronna Rollins
title: Ronna Rollins
text: My wife and I work puzzles of variable sizes and content from 150 pieces to 1000 pieces. The pieces are easy to work with and connect well. The finished product is always beautiful. Anyone who enjoys putting puzzles together will enjoy working with the White Mountain Puzzles.
